com.srishti.sdk.devices.camera

Class CameraPreview

  • java.lang.Object
    • ViewGroup
      • com.srishti.sdk.devices.camera.CameraPreview

  • public class CameraPreview
extends ViewGroup
    This class is internal to the sdk and it is not exposed to the external users

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setCamera(Camera camera)
      This method initializes the supported preview sizes by collecting the parameters and preview sizes of the passed camera object.
      void surfaceChanged(SurfaceHolder holder, int format, int w, int h)
      This method is used to set the PreviewCallback, Parameters, AutoFocus and to start preview.
      void surfaceCreated(SurfaceHolder holder)
      This method is used to set the preview display.
      void surfaceDestroyed(SurfaceHolder holder)
      This method cancel the autofocus and stops the preview.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

        This method initializes the supported preview sizes by collecting the parameters and preview sizes of the passed camera object.

      • surfaceCreated

      • surfaceChanged

        public void surfaceChanged(SurfaceHolder holder,
                  int format,
                  int w,
                  int h)
        This method is used to set the PreviewCallback, Parameters, AutoFocus and to start preview.
        Parameters:
        holder - - This represents SurfaceHolder instance
        format - - format of the surface
        w - - Width of the preview
        h - - Height of the preview
